extendedInfo.description: Chat, meet and date hot guys in your area. Only Lads is a gay social network for gay, bi and curious guys. Join over 100,000 gay and bi guys dating and chatting right now!Only Lads is a popular online gay dating community which is now available on your phone. Find guys by searching by location, who visited your profile, your friends, favorites and more! Registration only takes 30 seconds (email verification required). We use your approximate location to find profiles around you although we never reveal your exact location to other users. You also get access to the awesome mobile & tablet optimised site: www.onlylads.com so you can pick up your messages when you're on your laptop or computer.You must be 18 years or older in or to use this gay dating/gay chat service. "Forget the other gay dating apps like Grindr, Manhunt, Scruff, Gaydar, Boyahoy and Jackd! ...Only Lads is our new favorite!" - DWR (Dating Website Reviews)This app is currently in beta & we will be upgrading the app and adding loads of great new features. Please send us a message if you are experiencing technical problems.

reviews.title: Nice looking app in places
reviews.comment: It\'s let down by the majority of the men on it though! Seriously I\'ve never seen so much ugly in one place! Icons in the main activity are blurry and and are also confusingly lifted from iOS which is strange given that you\'ve tried to style the app based on the Android style guidelines. Maybe replace these? You also need to be able to filter by age etc so that we don\'t have to endure looking at the profiles of creepy old men twice our age.
reviews.author: John Atkinson

reviews.title: Keeps uninstalling itself, very unreliable
reviews.comment: Look elsewhere for a more stable app as this is pure rubbish.
